text: Motion
Motion

Producer-san!
Good work!

Kaho, good job.
How was today's lesson?

It was tough again today,
but I feel like I've improved since yesterday!

That's good.
It seems like the training camp is fulfilling.

Yes!
It's hard, but it's fun!

I'll definitely support you, so cherish that feeling.
When you're having fun, it shows to others too.
Having fun... shows...!

For example... yeah,
like when you eventually teach juniors, right?

!?
Like this...!

You mentioned "becoming a teacher and teaching", right?
The person you teach could easily be someone other than a friend.
If Kaho continues to be an idol in the future!

Wow...! 
Me... a senior...!
I can't really imagine it!

Haha, that's right.
Everyone at the agency is older than Kaho.

Yes...!
Since it's all older sisters, it feels a bit strange...

Someday, when younger ones come...
will I become a teacher...?

Surely.
So... let's do our best to enjoy the rest of the training camp.

Yes!
I'll get good enough to teach! I'll do my best!
